column2: an A.M. Eatery////Another suggestion is to get a side of rocks with your mimosas
column3: or other drinks - ours ended up at the table close to room temperature.  The food itself
column4: as well as the drinks even at room temperature
column5: was seriously delicious and lived up to the hype
column6: and while its probably worth a wait
column7: it was not exactly worth my wait on a weekend - an hour and a half before being seated
column8: and another hour after that before we got our food.  The staff was pleasant
column9: despite the amount of customers they had to serve
column10: and apologetic about the wait for the food.
